name: Razer Asteroid Miner
description:
"Experience the legend reborn." Join the story of Flynn, a lone miner on a mission to undermine the Razer Mining Syndicate and one day jump beyond the belt fringe to the distant forbidden zone.

Jump deep into asteroid mines as you hunt for valuable resources, navigating twisting tunnels and outmaneuvering barriers at every turn. Collect and sell cargo for advanced upgrades to your Razer, adding firepower, and gaining access to more destinations. 

Built with the heart of an endless runner, RAM is a thrilling arcade space shooter with story-driven progress hinting at a larger saga to unfold.

This game is in active development. The current version is an alpha of the first level from the first of four planned chapters to be released as game updates. Each chapter plans to bring fresh locations, gameplay and storyline.  

It is my pleasure to share this imaginative creation with you and I welcome your feedback and your support. Your donation now will help carry this game to the stars! Please consider giving a small amount to help our continued development of RAZER ASTEROID MINER!

Make the jump and find out how far you can go!
